North-Indian.name: North Indian Thali
North-Indian.description: A traditional North Indian meal with a variety of dishes including dal, sabzi, roti, and rice.

North-Indian.name: South Indian Thali
North-Indian.description: A traditional South Indian meal featuring sambar, rasam, vegetable curry, and dosas.

North-Indian.name: Gujarati Thali
North-Indian.description: A sweet and savory Gujarati meal with dishes like undhiyu, kadhi, and puris.

North-Indian.name: Rajasthani Thali
North-Indian.description: A hearty Rajasthani meal with spicy curries, dal-baati-churma, and more.

South-Indian.name: Vegetable Sandwich
South-Indian.description: A classic Indian sandwich filled with fresh vegetables, chutney, and spices.

South-Indian.name: Paneer Tikka Sandwich
South-Indian.description: Grilled paneer tikka chunks with a blend of Indian spices and sauces.

South-Indian.name: Chicken Kebab Sandwich
South-Indian.description: Tender chicken kebabs with a spicy and tangy chutney.

South-Indian.name: Egg Mayo Sandwich
South-Indian.description: Creamy egg mayonnaise mixed with Indian spices and herbs.

pizza.name: Tandoori Veg Pizza
pizza.description: Pizza topped with tandoori vegetables, including bell peppers, onions, and mushrooms.

pizza.name: Butter Chicken Pizza
pizza.description: Pizza with a rich butter chicken topping and mozzarella cheese.

pizza.name: Paneer Tikka Pizza
pizza.description: Pizza topped with spicy paneer tikka and fresh vegetables.

pizza.name: Keema Pizza
pizza.description: Pizza with minced lamb keema, onions, and bell peppers.

desserts.name: Gulab Jamun
desserts.description: Deep-fried dough balls soaked in rose-flavored syrup.

desserts.name: Rasgulla
desserts.description: Soft and spongy cheese balls soaked in sugary syrup.

desserts.name: Kaju Katli
desserts.description: Thin, diamond-shaped slices of cashew nut fudge.

desserts.name: Jalebi
desserts.description: Crispy, spiral-shaped sweet made from fermented dough and soaked in syrup.

desserts.name: Rasmalai
desserts.description: Creamy dessert with sweetened, spongy cheese patties in flavored milk.

biryani.name: Hyderabadi Biryani
biryani.description: A traditional biryani with rich spices and tender meat.

biryani.name: Vegetable Biryani
biryani.description: A flavorful biryani made with mixed vegetables and aromatic spices.

biryani.name: Chicken Biryani
biryani.description: Classic chicken biryani with fragrant basmati rice and spices.

biryani.name: Mutton Biryani
biryani.description: Rich and flavorful mutton biryani cooked with aromatic spices.

biryani.name: Paneer Biryani
biryani.description: Biryani made with paneer, mixed with spices and herbs.

curries.name: Butter Chicken
curries.description: A rich and creamy curry made with tender chicken pieces simmered in a spiced tomato and butter sauce.

curries.name: Palak Paneer
curries.description: A vegetarian dish made with paneer (Indian cottage cheese) and cooked in a spiced spinach gravy.

curries.name: Chana Masala
curries.description: A hearty and flavorful curry made with chickpeas simmered in a spiced tomato sauce.

curries.name: Rogan Josh
curries.description: A flavorful and aromatic lamb curry cooked with a blend of spices and yogurt.

curries.name: Dal Makhani
curries.description: A creamy and savory curry made with black lentils and kidney beans, cooked with butter and cream.

salad.name: Kachumber Salad
salad.description: A refreshing mix of cucumbers, tomatoes, onions, and lemon juice, seasoned with cumin and coriander.

salad.name: Chickpea Salad
salad.description: A hearty salad with chickpeas, red onions, bell peppers, and a tangy lemon dressing, garnished with fresh cilantro.

salad.name: Fruit Chaat
salad.description: A sweet and tangy fruit salad with apples, bananas, pomegranates, and a hint of chaat masala.

paratha.name: Aloo Paratha
paratha.description: Stuffed with a spiced potato filling, served with yogurt and pickles.

paratha.name: Paneer Paratha
paratha.description: Stuffed with a spiced paneer (cottage cheese) filling, served with butter and chutney.

paratha.name: Methi Paratha
paratha.description: Made with fenugreek leaves and spices, offers a unique and flavorful taste.

paratha.name: Keema Paratha
paratha.description: Stuffed with spiced minced meat (keema), perfect for meat lovers.

iceCream.name: Kulfi
iceCream.description: Traditional Indian frozen dessert made with milk, cardamom, and saffron.

iceCream.name: Rasmalai Ice-Cream
iceCream.description: Creamy ice-cream infused with flavors of rasmalai, a popular Indian sweet.

iceCream.name: Mango Ice-Cream
iceCream.description: Rich and creamy ice-cream made with fresh mango pulp, perfect for summer.

iceCream.name: Gulab Jamun Ice-Cream
iceCream.description: Delicious ice-cream with flavors of gulab jamun, a popular Indian sweet.

chinese.name: Chili Chicken
chinese.description: Spicy chicken stir-fried with bell peppers, onions, and a tangy sauce.

chinese.name: Vegetable Manchurian
chinese.description: Deep-fried vegetable balls in a flavorful Manchurian sauce.

chinese.name: Hakka Noodles
chinese.description: Stir-fried noodles with vegetables and a hint of soy sauce.

chinese.name: Chicken Fried Rice
chinese.description: Flavorful fried rice with chicken and mixed vegetables.

burgers.name: Paneer Tikka Burger
burgers.description: Juicy paneer tikka patty with fresh vegetables and a tangy sauce.

burgers.name: Aloo Tikki Burger
burgers.description: Crispy aloo tikki patty with chutneys, lettuce, and onions.

burgers.name: Keema Burger
burgers.description: Spicy minced meat patty with onions, tomatoes, and a flavorful sauce.

burgers.name: Chicken Malai Burger
burgers.description: Tender chicken malai patty with a creamy sauce and fresh veggies.

FastFood.name: Paneer Tikka
FastFood.description: Grilled chunks of marinated paneer served with mint chutney.

FastFood.name: Chole Bhature
FastFood.description: Spicy chickpea curry served with deep-fried bread.

FastFood.name: Aloo Tikki
FastFood.description: Spicy potato patties served with chutneys.

FastFood.name: Chicken Kebab
FastFood.description: Marinated chicken pieces grilled to perfection.

FastFood.name: Pav Bhaji
FastFood.description: Spicy mixed vegetable curry served with buttered bread rolls.

FastFood.name: Samosa
FastFood.description: Crispy pastry filled with spiced potatoes and peas.
